title: Prison attack that killed Ukraine PoWs a war crime, says Zelenskiy, amid calls for UN inquiry
content:
1. Prison attack that killed Ukraine PoWs a war crime, says Zelenskiy, amid calls for UN inquiry  The Guardian
  2. WARNING: GRAPHIC CONTENT - Russia, Ukraine trade blame after dozens killed in prison blast  Reuters
  3. "Azov" announces a hunt for everyone involved in mass murder of prisoners in Olenivka  Yahoo News
  4. Russia claims 40 Ukrainian POWs killed in strike with US HIMARS, Ukraine decries 'brutal execution'  Fox News
  5. Russia is 'largest source of terrorism in today's world': Zelenskiy  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
